segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable—it’s about to tip over!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing on his toes, completely focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel nervous just looking at him—he’s going to fall!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is making the floor slippery—this is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy even realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at them to be careful!
segments.speaker: PAR
